luz.title: LUZ
luz.subtitle: Unified Scheduling Hub
luz.noShiftsAvailable: No shifts available for this day

shift.title: Shift
shift.noShifts: No shifts scheduled for this day
shift.createFirstShift: Create your first shift template to get started

staffing.clickGenerate: Click "Generate from Hours" to create slots based on your schedule

assignment.submitRequestToJoin: Submit a request to join this shift
assignment.alreadyAssignedMessage: You already have an assignment for this shift on {{date}}.
assignment.mustSelectTimeSlots: You must select at least one time slot
assignment.noSpecificHours: No specific hours selected. You'll be considered for the full shift: {{openTime}} - {{closeTime}}
assignment.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Any additional information about your request, availability, or special considerations...
assignment.conflictWarning: You already have {{count}} assignment(s) on this date. Please ensure there are no scheduling conflicts.
assignment.managerAutoApprove1: As a manager, your request will be automatically approved
assignment.managerAutoApprove2: Your assignment will be confirmed immediately
assignment.managerAutoApprove3: You can view your confirmed assignment in the assignments dashboard
assignment.workerApproval1: Your request will be sent to managers for approval
assignment.workerApproval2: You'll be notified once a decision is made
assignment.workerApproval3: You can view the status in your assignments dashboard
assignment.noWorkersFound: No workers found matching your search
assignment.noAvailableWorkers: No available workers (all may be already assigned to this shift)
assignment.noBreakPeriods: No break periods defined. Click "Add Break" to schedule breaks.
assignment.assignmentNotesPlaceholder: Any specific instructions, requirements, or notes for this assignment...
assignment.workerNotification: Worker will receive a notification to approve this assignment
assignment.assignmentBecomesActive: Assignment becomes active once worker approves
assignment.canModifyBeforeApproval: You can modify assignments before worker approval
assignment.breakPeriodsOptional: Break periods are optional and can be adjusted as needed
assignment.atLeastOneTimeSlot: At least one time slot must be assigned
assignment.endTimeAfterStartTime: End time must be after start time for all slots
assignment.assignedHoursWithinShift: Assigned hours must be within shift operating hours
assignment.breakEndAfterStart: Break end time must be after start time
assignment.canOnlyEditOwnAssignments: You can only edit your own assignments or you need manager permissions.
assignment.noChangesToHours: No changes to hours. Current assignment hours will be kept.
assignment.editNotesPlaceholder: Explain what changes you're requesting and why...
assignment.removeAllSlotsDeleteImmediate: Removing all time slots will delete this assignment immediately.
assignment.removeAllSlotsRequestDeletionWorkerAppro: Removing all time slots will request deletion. Worker approval required.
assignment.removeAllSlotsRequestDeletionManagerAppr: Removing all time slots will request deletion. Manager approval required.
assignment.managerEditConfirmed: As a manager, your edit will create a new confirmed assignment
assignment.originalAssignmentReplaced: The original assignment will be replaced immediately
assignment.changesEffectiveImmediately: Changes will be effective right away
assignment.workerEditNeedsApproval: Your edit request will need manager approval
assignment.originalAssignmentStaysActive: Original assignment stays active until approved
assignment.notifiedOnDecision: You'll be notified once a decision is made
assignment.editRequestSentToWorkerManagers: Edit request will be sent to the worker and managers
assignment.requiresApprovalBoth: Requires approval from both worker and management
assignment.allRequestsProcessed: All assignment requests have been processed

form.optionalNotes: Optional notes for this time range
form.selectOneDay: At least one recurring day must be selected
form.oneRequirement: At least one hourly requirement is needed
form.optimalGreaterThanMin: Optimal workers must be >= minimum workers >= 0
form.defineNewTemplate: Define a new recurring shift template
